title: Microsoft forced me to switch to Linux
summary:
The author, a lifelong Windows user, describes their forced migration to Linux due to Microsoft's aggressive and deteriorating Windows experience. After over 20 years of comfortable use, frustrations mounted with Windows 10 and 11, specifically citing unconsented updates that closed unsaved work, pervasive ads for OneDrive and Copilot, and critical system bugs.

The breaking point came with the 24H2 update, which installed without permission and caused a "Chrome Seizure Incident" leading to system freezes. Rollbacks failed, and even a fresh install didn't resolve the issue. An NVIDIA-Microsoft driver incompatibility further plagued the system, causing Chrome lock-ups, with both companies passing blame. The author realized Windows had become "too much work" and disrespectful, actively fighting the user.

Consequently, the author switched to CachyOS, an Arch-based Linux distribution. Despite initial hurdles like broken sleep mode and the absence of a native Ableton Live, they successfully resolved NVIDIA driver issues and found native alternatives like Bitwig Studio.

The author's 2026 assessment of Linux highlights its strengths: full support for web browsing and software development, strong music production capabilities (Bitwig, PipeWire), and significantly improved gaming performance via Proton (especially for AMD GPUs, with NVIDIA catching up). While some content creation (Adobe) and 3D modeling still pose challenges, Linux's general usage is faster and more responsive.

The article concludes that the switch was not ideological but a forced response to Microsoft's self-sabotage, buggy updates, AI-driven code, and resource-intensive React Native apps, sarcastically deeming CEO Satya Nadella the "biggest Linux evangelist."
chinese_title: 微软迫使我改用 Linux。
chinese_summary:
作者作为一名终身Windows用户，描述了他们由于微软激进且日益恶化的Windows使用体验而被迫迁移到Linux的经历。在20多年的舒适使用后，对Windows 10和11的挫败感日益增加，特别是提到了未经同意就关闭未保存工作的更新、OneDrive和Copilot无处不在的广告以及关键的系统bug。

压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草是24H2更新，它未经许可自动安装，并导致了“Chrome抽搐事件”，进而引发系统冻结。回滚失败，甚至重新安装也未能解决问题。NVIDIA和微软的驱动不兼容进一步困扰着系统，导致Chrome卡死，而两家公司互相推诿责任。作者意识到Windows已经变得“太麻烦了”而且不尊重用户，它在积极地与用户作对。

于是，作者转向了基于Arch的Linux发行版CachyOS。尽管最初遇到了一些障碍，例如睡眠模式失效和没有原生的Ableton Live，但他们成功解决了NVIDIA驱动问题，并找到了Bitwig Studio等原生替代品。

作者对Linux在2026年的评估强调了它的优势：对网页浏览和软件开发的全面支持，强大的音乐制作能力（Bitwig、PipeWire），以及通过Proton显著提升的游戏性能（尤其是对于AMD显卡，NVIDIA也正在迎头赶上）。尽管一些内容创作（Adobe）和3D建模仍然面临挑战，但Linux的日常使用更快、响应更灵敏。

文章总结认为，这次转换并非出于意识形态，而是对微软的自我破坏、充满bug的更新、AI驱动的代码以及资源密集型React Native应用的一种被迫回应，讽刺地称CEO萨提亚·纳德拉为“最大的Linux布道者”。

title: Apple to soon take up to 30% cut from all Patreon creators in iOS app
summary:
Apple is set to implement a 30% commission on all payments made to Patreon creators via its iOS app, with a new deadline of November 1, 2026, for creators to adopt the App Store's in-app purchase system. Apple views these fan payments to creators as digital goods, justifying its entitlement to a commission.

The standard commission is 30% for in-app purchases and new subscriptions, which reduces to 15% for subscriptions active for over a year. Patreon offers creators two options: either raise their prices specifically for iOS users to offset Apple's fee, or absorb the cost themselves, maintaining consistent pricing across platforms.

Notably, iPhone and iPad users can bypass Apple's commission by completing their payments through Patreon's website. Patreon has expressed its disappointment with Apple's policy. According to TechCrunch, a significant majority (96%) of Patreon creators have already switched from the platform's legacy billing system to Apple's required system, with only 4% remaining. Patreon has also released an FAQ to provide creators with more details.
chinese_title: 苹果即将向其iOS应用内的所有Patreon创作者抽成最高30%。
chinese_summary:
苹果公司将对其iOS应用内向Patreon创作者支付的所有款项征收30%的佣金，并设定了2026年11月1日为创作者采用App Store应用内购买系统的新截止日期。苹果公司将粉丝向创作者支付的这些款项视为数字商品，以此作为其收取佣金的理由。

应用内购买和新订阅的标准佣金为30%，而对于活跃超过一年的订阅，佣金将降至15%。Patreon 为创作者提供了两种选择：要么专门为 iOS 用户提高价格以抵消苹果的费用，要么自行承担成本，从而在所有平台上保持价格一致。

值得注意的是，iPhone 和 iPad 用户可以通过 Patreon 网站完成支付，从而绕过苹果的佣金。Patreon 已对苹果的这项政策表示失望。据 TechCrunch 报道，绝大多数（96%）的 Patreon 创作者已经从该平台的旧版计费系统切换到苹果要求的系统，仅有4%尚未切换。Patreon 还发布了常见问题解答 (FAQ)，以向创作者提供更多详细信息。

title: Vitamin D and Omega-3 have a larger effect on depression than antidepressants
summary:
The article posits that Vitamin D and Omega-3 supplements demonstrate a greater impact on depression than conventional antidepressants. While antidepressants exhibit an average standardized effect size of approximately 0.4 (equivalent to improving mental health from a C to a C+), Omega-3s, particularly 1500 mg/day of "≥60% EPA," show an effect size of around 0.6 to 1.0 (C to B– or B). The author notes current official Omega-3 recommendations are several times too low for optimal depression effects, though the suggested dose is well within safe limits (5000 mg/day).

Vitamin D is presented as even more effective, with an estimated effect size of about 1.8 at 5000 IU/day (not 5000 mg, as clarified). This is likened to a significant improvement from a C to an A– in mental health, and it's effective even for those without a diagnosed Vitamin D insufficiency. The author argues that official Vitamin D recommendations, including "max safe dose," are outdated and too low.

Both supplements are described as safe, cheap, and over-the-counter, with additional benefits for Covid and cognitive function. They can be taken concurrently with antidepressants. The article urges individuals, unless contraindicated (e.g., kidney stones for Vitamin D, blood thinners for Omega-3), to try these supplements for at least a month, suggesting they could significantly improve mental health and potentially save lives.
chinese_title: 维生素D和欧米伽-3对抑郁症的作用比抗抑郁药更大。
chinese_summary:
文章指出，维生素D和Omega-3补充剂对抑郁症的影响比传统抗抑郁药更大。抗抑郁药的平均标准化效应量约为0.4（相当于将心理健康状况从C级提升到C+），而Omega-3，特别是每天1500毫克“≥60% EPA”的Omega-3，效应量约为0.6到1.0（从C级提升到B-或B级）。作者指出，目前官方推荐的Omega-3剂量对于获得最佳抗抑郁效果而言低了几倍，尽管建议的剂量远在安全范围内（每天5000毫克）。

维生素D被认为更有效，估计每天5000国际单位（非5000毫克，已澄清）的效应量约为1.8。这被比作心理健康状况从C级显著提升到A-级，即使对于未被诊断为维生素D不足的人也有效。作者认为，包括“最大安全剂量”在内的官方维生素D推荐剂量已经过时且过低。

这两种补充剂都被描述为安全、便宜、非处方药，并对新冠肺炎和认知功能有额外益处。它们可以与抗抑郁药同时服用。文章敦促个人，除非有禁忌症（例如，维生素D的肾结石，Omega-3的血液稀释剂），尝试服用这些补充剂至少一个月，并表示它们可能显著改善心理健康并有可能挽救生命。

title: We can’t send mail farther than 500 miles (2002)
summary:
In 2002, Trey Harris, a university email system administrator, received a bizarre report from the statistics department: they couldn't send emails farther than 500-520 miles. Initially incredulous, Harris personally verified the problem, confirming emails to destinations like New York (420 miles) worked, while those to Memphis (600 miles) or Providence (580 miles) failed.

His investigation revealed the root cause: a consultant's recent SunOS upgrade had inadvertently *downgraded* the server's Sendmail software from version 8 to version 5. Although the `sendmail.cf` configuration file, written by Harris, was designed for Sendmail 8, the older Sendmail 5 couldn't parse the new, longer option names. Consequently, critical settings, including the "timeout to connect to the remote SMTP server," defaulted to zero.

Experimentation showed a zero timeout aborted connection attempts after just over three milliseconds. Crucially, the campus network was 100% switched, meaning connection delays to remote hosts were largely governed by the speed of light, not router delays. Harris calculated that three "millilightseconds" (the time it took for the connection to abort) corresponds to approximately 558 miles, precisely explaining the mysterious 500-mile email limit as a literal, physical boundary caused by a software version mismatch.
chinese_title: 我们无法将邮件寄送超过500英里 (2002年)
chinese_summary:
2002年，大学电子邮件系统管理员特雷·哈里斯接到了统计系一个奇怪的报告：他们无法发送距离超过500-520英里的电子邮件。哈里斯最初对此表示怀疑，但他亲自验证了问题，确认发往纽约（420英里）等地的邮件成功，而发往孟菲斯（600英里）或普罗维登斯（580英里）的邮件则失败了。

他的调查揭示了根本原因：一名顾问最近进行的SunOS升级无意中将服务器的Sendmail软件从版本8“降级”到了版本5。尽管哈里斯编写的`sendmail.cf`配置文件是为Sendmail 8设计的，但旧版Sendmail 5无法解析新的、更长的选项名称。结果，包括“连接远程SMTP服务器的超时时间”在内的关键设置都默认为零。

实验表明，零超时设置会在略多于三毫秒后中止连接尝试。关键在于，校园网络是100%交换式的，这意味着连接到远程主机的延迟主要受光速而非路由器延迟的影响。哈里斯计算出，三“毫光秒”（连接中止所需的时间）对应大约558英里，精准地解释了神秘的500英里电子邮件限制，即它是一个由软件版本不匹配引起的字面意义上的物理边界。

title: Europe’s next-generation weather satellite sends back first images
summary:
Europe's Meteosat Third Generation-Sounder (MTG-S) satellite has transmitted its first images, demonstrating its capacity to revolutionize weather forecasting over Europe and northern Africa. Launched on July 1, 2025, the mission aims to provide enhanced data on temperature and humidity, significantly improving the prediction of severe storms.

The satellite's Infrared Sounder instrument, the first European hyperspectral sounding instrument in geostationary orbit, captured full-disc images on November 15, 2025. These include a "temperature" map, showing warmer land surfaces (e.g., Africa, South America) in dark red and cooler cloud tops in blue, and a "humidity" map, depicting high humidity in blue and low humidity (e.g., Sahara Desert) in red. Close-up images of Europe and North Africa further illustrate temperature variations, and MTG-S successfully tracked the Hayli Gubbi volcano eruption on November 23, 2025, monitoring evolving ash plumes.

Operating from geostationary orbit, MTG-S provides temperature and humidity data every 30 minutes, complementing cloud and lightning data from the MTG-Imager. Its 1700 infrared channels will enable the creation of three-dimensional maps of the atmosphere, including wind and trace gases, vastly improving nowcasting and allowing for earlier, more accurate predictions of extreme weather events. Developed by ESA in collaboration with partners like Eumetsat, this mission represents a significant advancement in Earth observation, with MTG-S also hosting the Copernicus Sentinel-4 mission.
chinese_title: 欧洲下一代气象卫星传回首批图像
chinese_summary:
欧洲的“第三代静止气象卫星探测器”（MTG-S）卫星已传回首批图像，展示了其彻底改变欧洲和北非天气预报的潜力。该任务于2025年7月1日发射，旨在提供增强的温度和湿度数据，显著提升对强风暴的预测能力。

该卫星的红外探测器，作为欧洲首个位于地球静止轨道的超光谱探测器，于2025年11月15日捕捉到全盘图像。其中包括一张“温度”图，以深红色显示较暖的陆地表面（如非洲、南美洲），以蓝色显示较冷的云顶；以及一张“湿度”图，以蓝色表示高湿度，以红色表示低湿度（如撒哈拉沙漠）。欧洲和北非的特写图像进一步展示了温度变化，MTG-S还于2025年11月23日成功追踪了海利古比火山喷发，监测不断变化的火山灰羽流。

MTG-S在地球静止轨道上运行，每30分钟提供一次温度和湿度数据，补充了来自MTG-成像仪的云层和闪电数据。其1700个红外通道将能够创建大气的三维地图，包括风和微量气体，从而大幅提升临近预报能力，并实现对极端天气事件更早、更准确的预测。这项任务由欧洲空间局（ESA）与欧洲气象卫星应用组织（Eumetsat）等伙伴合作开发，代表着地球观测领域的重大进展，MTG-S还承载着哥白尼“哨兵-4”任务。

title: Somebody used spoofed ADSB signals to raster the meme of JD Vance
summary:
On January 28, 2026, an individual or group used spoofed ADSB signals to create a "raster" image of the JD Vance meme over Mar-a-Lago. The spoofed signals mimicked a VC-25A (Air Force One) and utilized the AF2 ICAO identity, displaying the call sign "VANCE1."

The event, visible on ADSB exchange platforms, shows a deliberate manipulation of aircraft tracking data to project a specific image geographically. The incident sparked discussions, including a humorous suggestion of "age verification for ADSB" and minor nitpicking over the use of the word "raster" instead of "rasterize." This act highlights the vulnerability of ADSB systems to spoofing and raises questions about potential future regulations.
chinese_title: 有人利用伪造的ADSB信号栅格化了JD Vance的表情包。
chinese_summary:
On January 28, 2026, an individual or group used spoofed ADSB signals to create a "raster" image of the JD Vance meme over Mar-a-Lago. The spoofed signals mimicked a VC-25A (Air Force One) and utilized the AF2 ICAO identity, displaying the call sign "VANCE1."

The event, visible on ADSB exchange platforms, shows a deliberate manipulation of aircraft tracking data to project a specific image geographically. The incident sparked discussions, including a humorous suggestion of "age verification for ADSB" and minor nitpicking over the use of the word "raster" instead of "rasterize." This act highlights the vulnerability of ADSB systems to spoofing and raises questions about potential future regulations.

title: Thief of $90M in seized U.S.-controlled crypto is gov't contractor's son
summary:
On January 23, 2026, crypto sleuth zachxbt alleged that "Lick," the thief behind the theft of approximately $90 million in seized U.S.-controlled cryptocurrency, is John Daghita. The identity was uncovered after Daghita inadvertently revealed a wallet address during a screenshare with another crypto thief, which zachxbt linked to significant thefts, including a $20 million incident in October 2024.

John Daghita is reportedly the son of Dean Daghita, owner of Command Services & Support (CMDSS). In October 2024, CMDSS secured an active contract with the US Marshals to manage seized crypto assets. Following zachxbt's revelations, both "Lick" (John Daghita) and CMDSS took defensive actions: Daghita attempted to scrub his Telegram account and "dusted" zachxbt's public crypto wallet, while CMDSS scrubbed its entire online presence. Subsequently, "Lick" trolled zachxbt and even sent him 0.6767 ETH (approximately $1,900) from the stolen funds. CMDSS's website previously highlighted its role as a "proven provider of mission-critical services to the Department of Defense and Department of Justice," raising concerns about potential insider involvement in the thefts.
chinese_title: Thief of $90M in seized U.S.-controlled crypto is gov't contractor's son
chinese_summary:
2026年1月23日，加密侦探zachxbt指控，盗窃了约9000万美元被查获的美国控制加密货币的窃贼“Lick”，就是John Daghita。这一身份是在Daghita与另一名加密货币窃贼进行屏幕共享时无意中透露了一个钱包地址后被发现的，zachxbt将该地址与包括2024年10月一起2000万美元事件在内的多起重大盗窃案联系起来。

据报道，John Daghita是Command Services & Support (CMDSS) 的所有者Dean Daghita的儿子。2024年10月，CMDSS与美国法警局签署了一份有效合同，负责管理被查获的加密资产。在zachxbt揭露此事后，“Lick”（John Daghita）和CMDSS都采取了防御行动：Daghita试图清除他的Telegram账户，并“扬尘”了zachxbt的公共加密钱包，而CMDSS则删除了其所有的在线信息。随后，“Lick”嘲讽了zachxbt，甚至从被盗资金中向他发送了0.6767 ETH（约1900美元）。CMDSS的网站此前曾强调其是“美国国防部和司法部的关键任务服务可靠提供商”，这引发了人们对盗窃案中可能存在内部人员参与的担忧。
